org.encryptor4j

Class ECDHPeer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.encryptor4j.KeyAgreementPeer
      • org.encryptor4j.ECDHPeer

  • public class ECDHPeer
extends KeyAgreementPeer

    KeyAgreementPeer implementation that uses the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman key agreement protocol.

    Author:
    Martin

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ECDHPeer(java.security.spec.AlgorithmParameterSpec spec)
